message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle!
I'll meet you halfway, but not all the way to your side
You're getting closer, but I want more!
I'm still not giving up too much, but I'll try to find a compromise
Getting desperate, but I still want a good deal!
I'm getting closer to your side, but I still want a fair share
Getting close to the end, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm trying to find a balance, but I'm not giving up yet
Getting desperate, but I'm not going to give in easily!
I'm trying to find a way to end this, but I'm not giving up yet
Last chance, let's make a deal!
